original_text: Then answered one of the lawyers, and said unto him, Master, thus saying thou reproachest us also.
korean_text: 한 율법교사가 예수께 대답하여 이르되 선생님 이렇게 말씀하시니 우리까지 모욕하심이니이다

sentences.original_text: Then answered one of the lawyers
thus saying thou reproachest us also
sentences.korean_translation: 이렇게 말함으로써 당신은 우리도 욕되게 하시는군요
